languages.text: "Возможно, чтобы безумцы не тревожили их. Зная, что ты на борту, я бы тут еще поставил ловушки с машинной искрой".
languages.translation_comment:
Having entered the dark interior of the dynastic crypt on the flagship.
Kibellah: "These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, чтобы безумцы не тревожили их. Зная, что ты на борту, я бы тут еще поставил ловушки с машинной искрой".

languages.text: "Maybe they are here so that overeager lunatics do not disturb them. With you on board, I would have packed this crypt with traps charged with the machine spark."
languages.translation_comment:
Having entered the dark interior of the dynastic crypt on the flagship.
Kibellah: "These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"

traits.locale_text: "Maybe they are here so that overeager lunatics do not disturb them. With you on board, I would have packed this crypt with traps charged with the machine spark."
"Maybe they are here so that overeager lunatics do not disturb them. With you on board, I would have packed this crypt with traps charged with the machine spark."

"Maybe they are here so that overeager lunatics do not disturb them. With you on board, I would have packed this crypt with traps charged with the machine spark."

languages.text: 「もしかすると、熱狂的な愚か者たちに邪魔されないよう、彼らはここにいるのかもしれないな。お前が同行していたら、この墓所には機械の火花を帯びた罠をびっしり仕掛けていただろう」
languages.original_text: "Maybe they are here so that overeager lunatics do not disturb them. With you on board, I would have packed this crypt with traps charged with the machine spark."

traits.locale_text: 「もしかすると、熱狂的な愚か者たちに邪魔されないよう、彼らはここにいるのかもしれないな。お前が同行していたら、この墓所には機械の火花を帯びた罠をびっしり仕掛けていただろう」

languages.text: "Vielleicht sind sie hier, damit sie nicht von übereifrigen Fanatikern gestört werden. Mit Euch an Bord hätte ich diese Krypta mit Fallen vollgepackt, die mit dem Maschinenfunken geladen sind."
languages.original_text: "Maybe they are here so that overeager lunatics do not disturb them. With you on board, I would have packed this crypt with traps charged with the machine spark."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht sind sie hier, damit sie nicht von übereifrigen Fanatikern gestört werden. Mit Euch an Bord hätte ich diese Krypta mit Fallen vollgepackt, die mit dem Maschinenfunken geladen sind."

languages.text: « On les a peut-être laissés ici pour les tenir hors de portée des zélotes déments qui voudraient les profaner. Avec vous dans les parages, j'aurais rempli cette crypte de pièges chargés de l'étincelle de la machine. »
languages.original_text: "Maybe they are here so that overeager lunatics do not disturb them. With you on board, I would have packed this crypt with traps charged with the machine spark."

traits.locale_text: « On les a peut-être laissés ici pour les tenir hors de portée des zélotes déments qui voudraient les profaner. Avec vous dans les parages, j'aurais rempli cette crypte de pièges chargés de l'étincelle de la machine. »

languages.text: «A lo mejor están aquí para que ninguna lunática con exceso de entusiasmo pueda profanarlos. Con usted a bordo, yo habría llenado esta cripta de trampas cargadas con la chispa de la máquina».
languages.original_text: "Maybe they are here so that overeager lunatics do not disturb them. With you on board, I would have packed this crypt with traps charged with the machine spark."

traits.locale_text: «A lo mejor están aquí para que ninguna lunática con exceso de entusiasmo pueda profanarlos. Con usted a bordo, yo habría llenado esta cripta de trampas cargadas con la chispa de la máquina».

languages.text: “或许这些遗骨之所以会摆在这里，就是为了不让那些狂热的疯子打扰它们安息。考虑到你也在这艘船上，如果换做是我，我会在这个地下墓穴里布满陷阱。”
languages.original_text: "Maybe they are here so that overeager lunatics do not disturb them. With you on board, I would have packed this crypt with traps charged with the machine spark."

traits.locale_text: “或许这些遗骨之所以会摆在这里，就是为了不让那些狂热的疯子打扰它们安息。考虑到你也在这艘船上，如果换做是我，我会在这个地下墓穴里布满陷阱。”

languages.text: "Belki de hevesli ruh hastalarından uzak durmak istemişlerdir. Gemide sen varken bu mahzeni makine kıvılcımı yüklü tuzaklarla doldurmak lazım."
languages.original_text: "Maybe they are here so that overeager lunatics do not disturb them. With you on board, I would have packed this crypt with traps charged with the machine spark."
